#{item}

SELECT csp.invoice_catalog_type,csp.application_desc,csp.application_address_id,csi.invoice_url,csi.tax_receipt_url,csi.express_company_name,csi.express_sheet_no FROM tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice as csi LEFT JOIN tb_invoice_catalog as ci ON csi.invoice_catalog_id=ci.id LEFT JOIN tb_crowd_sourcing_application as csp ON csi.application_id=csp.id WHERE csi.id=#{csiId}

select COUNT(1) 'count', SUM(d.invoice_money) 'total_money' from tb_payment_order_many b join tb_crowd_sourcing_application c on b.id = c.payment_order_many_id join tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice d on c.id = d.application_id where b.tax_id = #{taxId}

select COUNT(1) 'count', SUM(d.invoice_money) 'total_money' from tb_payment_order_many b join tb_crowd_sourcing_application c on b.id = c.payment_order_many_id join tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice d on c.id = d.application_id where b.tax_id in
#{item}

SELECT pom.id, pom.company_s_name, pom.platform_service_provider, pom.payment_inventory, pom.acceptance_certificate, pom.many_payment, pom.payment_order_status, pom.payment_date, t.task_code, t.task_name, t.release_date, t.deadline_date, t.industry_type FROM tb_crowd_sourcing_application csa INNER JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.id = csa.payment_order_many_id LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = pom.task_id WHERE csa.id =#{appcationId}

SELECT pi.id, pi.worker_id, pi.worker_name, pi.mobile_code, pi.id_card_code, pi.bank_code, pi.real_money, pi.task_money, pom.tax_id, pom.recevice_tax FROM tb_crowd_sourcing_application csa INNER JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.id = csa.payment_order_many_id INNER JOIN tb_payment_inventory pi ON pi.payment_order_id = pom.id WHERE csa.id=#{payId}

SELECT m.company_name, ci.credit_code, ci.company_address, ci.telephones, ci.bank_name, ci.bank_code FROM tb_merchant AS m LEFT JOIN tb_company_info AS ci ON m.company_id = ci.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.company_id=ci.id INNER JOIN tb_crowd_sourcing_application csa ON csa.payment_order_many_id =pom.id WHERE csa.id=#{id} LIMIT 0,1
select invoice_code from tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice where create_date in (select MAX(create_date) from tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice)

SELECT pi.id,pi.worker_id,pi.worker_name,pi.mobile_code,pi.id_card_code,pi.bank_code,pi.real_money,pi.task_money,pi.tax_rate,pi.tax_amount,pom.recevice_tax from tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice csi inner JOIN tb_payment_inventory pi ON pi.payment_order_id=csi.payment_order_many_id inner JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.id=csi.payment_order_many_id WHERE csi.id=#{param2}

SELECT csi.invoice_url, csi.express_company_name, csi.express_sheet_no FROM tb_payment_order_many pom INNER JOIN tb_crowd_sourcing_application csa ON csa.payment_order_many_id=pom.id INNER JOIN tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice csi ON csi.application_id=csa.id WHERE pom.id = #{paymentOrderId}

SELECT pom.id, pom.company_s_name, pom.platform_service_provider, pom.payment_inventory, pom.acceptance_certificate, pom.many_payment, pom.payment_order_status, pom.payment_date, t.task_code, t.task_name, t.release_date, t.deadline_date, t.industry_type FROM tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice csi INNER JOIN tb_crowd_sourcing_application csa ON csa.id = csi.application_id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.id = csa.payment_order_many_id LEFT JOIN tb_task t ON t.id = pom.task_id where csi.id=#{invoiceId}

SELECT csi.express_sheet_no, csi.express_company_name, a.address_name, a.link_mobile, a.link_name, t.tax_address, t.link_man, t.link_mobile as tax_mobile FROM tb_crowd_sourcing_invoice csi INNER JOIN tb_crowd_sourcing_application csa ON csi.application_id = csa.id INNER JOIN tb_payment_order_many pom ON pom.id = csa.payment_order_many_id INNER JOIN tb_company_info ci ON ci.id = pom.company_id INNER JOIN tb_tax t ON t.id = pom.tax_id INNER JOIN tb_address a ON a.id = csa.application_address_id where csi.id=#{invoiceId}
